Projects

TapNServe

A restaurant management system designed to streamline operations and enhance the dining experience. Customers can browse menus, place pre-orders, and request assistance, while waitstaff manage tables and receive real-time notifications. The kitchen benefits from live order tracking and instant communication with the staff.

  • React
  • Socket.IO
  • Next.js
  • Node.js

Visit Project

View Code

Point of Sale

This point of sale (POS) system developed with Windows Forms is designed to efficiently manage sales, inventory, and customer operations in a retail business environment. The integration with SAP Business One allows for the synchronization of key data, such as inventory, transactions, and administrative reports, ensuring a centralized and automated flow of information.

  • .NET
  • C#

Visit Project

View Code

Hotel-Luxury

is a web application developed using .NET and C#, designed for a hotel business offering various customer packages. It integrates dynamic content management, user-friendly interfaces, and secure booking functionalities. The site provides seamless navigation through its responsive design and utilizes modern web technologies to ensure performance and scalability. The backend handles package management, booking systems, and customer interaction, ensuring a smooth user experience from browsing to checkout.

  • .NET
  • C#

Visit Project

View Code

Journal

A journal management system built to securely store and manage entries, offering an intuitive interface for users to log their thoughts and experiences. The platform allows for easy sign-ins using Firestore authentication, ensuring secure access. Users can add, edit, and track their journal entries, with all data saved seamlessly in the cloud for easy retrieval and privacy.

  • React
  • Node.js

Visit Project

View Code

About Me

About

I'm a web developer with experience in designing interactive UIs and creating Full Stack solutions. I enjoy learning new technologies and improving my skills to build efficient, scalable apps.

Languages & Tools

  • Programming Languages: Java, Python, C#, JavaScript, TypeScript
  • Frameworks & Libraries: React, Astro, .NET, MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js), Tailwind CSS, Oak (Deno)
  • Databases: SQL, MySQL; design and query optimization
  • Tools & Methodologies: Node.js, Yarn, Docker, Git, Jest, Figma; best business practices, systems analysis & design

Skills

  • Frontend Development: Design & development of interactive, responsive UIs with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, ensuring a smooth, engaging experience.
  • UX/UI Optimization: Creating effective landing pages optimized for conversion, applying modern design & user experience principles.
  • Databases: Managing relational (MySQL) and non-relational databases, focusing on efficient design and optimized queries.
  • Tech Integration: Implementing Full Stack projects with modern frameworks like MERN and tools like Docker, Socket.io, and Postman.
